DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to investigate the psychological effects of burn injuries as experienced by patients.
DOC.brief_title: Long Term Follow-Up of Burn Injuries
DOC.detailed_description: We are interested in determining how people adjust to burn injuries as a way of facilitating optimal recovery. This is done by conducting several questionnaires at the time of the discharge in the hospital, and later follow up with the patients up to two years.
DOC.criteria: patients with more than a 30% total surface area burn English speaking Patients with less than a 30% total surface area burn Non English speaking
